trans-unit.target: TEXT_REGGYR3CASTELLUMVELODYNA_00458_SLEEPINGCOEURL_000_001<tab>I was stationed here shortly after the castellum was liberated from the Garleans.
TEXT_REGGYR3CASTELLUMVELODYNA_00458_SLEEPINGCOEURL_000_002<tab>Although I was later assigned to the Velodyna Gatekeepers, my role remains much the same.
TEXT_REGGYR3CASTELLUMVELODYNA_00458_SLEEPINGCOEURL_000_010<tab>This was simply called Velodyna bridge before the Garleans arrived. They saw fit to transform it into a base for their supply trains.
TEXT_REGGYR3CASTELLUMVELODYNA_00458_SLEEPINGCOEURL_000_011<tab>Following their departure, it was left to fall into disrepair. That was until Captain Alpa suggested putting it to good use.

TEXT_REGGYR3CASTELLUMVELODYNA_00458_SLEEPINGCOEURL_000_020<tab>We Gatekeepers are dedicated to our work, but unfortunately we are rather lacking in numbers. Eshana is always looking to hire adventurers, if you're interested.
TEXT_REGGYR3CASTELLUMVELODYNA_00458_SLEEPINGCOEURL_000_030<tab>The griffin statues are truly remarkable. I heard that Alpa had a gift for metalwork, but I had no idea she was so artistic.

TEXT_REGGYR3CASTELLUMVELODYNA_00458_SLEEPINGCOEURL_000_040<tab>Those guest rooms have made a world of difference. I'd much rather travelers slept here than become a midnight feast for some ghastly creature.
TEXT_REGGYR3CASTELLUMVELODYNA_00458_SLEEPINGCOEURL_000_050<tab>Now that we have an infirmary, sickly and hobbled travelers can receive proper treatment before they continue on their way.
TEXT_REGGYR3CASTELLUMVELODYNA_00458_SLEEPINGCOEURL_000_051<tab>Naturally, we Gatekeepers are also glad to have experienced chirurgeons on hand.

TEXT_REGGYR3CASTELLUMVELODYNA_00458_SLEEPINGCOEURL_000_060<tab>When I heard we were taking in Qalyana deserters, I was extremely apprehensive. And now they're sleeping under the same roof as the Vira!

TEXT_REGGYR3CASTELLUMVELODYNA_00458_SLEEPINGCOEURL_000_061<tab>If I were sharing quarters with a former enemy, I would be afraid of waking up with a dagger between my ribs. It seems Captain Alpa and her Vira friends are considerably more trusting than I am, though.

TEXT_REGGYR3CASTELLUMVELODYNA_00458_SLEEPINGCOEURL_000_070<tab>The castellum has certainly changed since the Gatekeepers arrived. Who could have guessed this former Garlean stronghold would become such a lively hub of activity?
TEXT_REGGYR3CASTELLUMVELODYNA_00458_SLEEPINGCOEURL_000_500<tab>This was simply called Velodyna bridge before the Garleans arrived. They saw fit to transform it into a base for their supply trains.
TEXT_REGGYR3CASTELLUMVELODYNA_00458_SLEEPINGCOEURL_000_501<tab>What's more, atop this tower they could survey the area for malms around. Their ambition knows no bounds, nor does their villainy.
